column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////Hi Jonathan - Thanks for your review. We appreciate your feedback
column2: and I regret that you had to wait so long for a table. We definitely have peak-service hours
column4: if we could go back in time we would have built a restaurant three times in size. Back in 2014 when there were only a handful of ramen shops in Houston
column5: we had no idea the demand for Japanese ramen would be so high. We were wrong. And as such
column6: we have launched several more JINYA restaurants in the greater Houston area. Hopefully this will alleviate some of the crowds.
